home-subtitle: I am a passionate Front-End developer. I am currently in my third year of Systems Engineering, which allows me to combine my theoretical knowledge with real-world practice. My goal is to provide optimal and efficient solutions to the technological challenges I encounter.

introData.description: I am 23 years old and I am a Front End Developer. I am currently a Systems Engineering student. I am passionate about technology, learning new skills and providing optimal and efficient solutions to any problem.

about-first-paragraph: My name is Mart√≠n Morondo and I am currently studying Systems Engineering at UNICEN. I am a passionate Front-end Developer based in Argentina.
about-second-paragraph: I love to design and create responsive websites or web applications from scratch. The technologies, tools and languages I use to build my projects are HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, React JS, Typescript, Bootstrap, Tailwind, Git, GitHub and VS Code.
about-third-paragraph: I am eager to learn something new every day and I love to share my knowledge with my colleagues and developers, and I look forward to talking to you!
